thread.title: Melissa khan
thread.title_full: Mabel's Labels reviewed by Melissa khan

author: Melissa khan
title: Melissa khan
text: I had bought the multi size with show lables and ended up wasting most of the because they cam off when washed and dried. Did not stick to bottle nipples and the bundle didnot indicate witch lable were for what. Not happy with the product. I have heared so many good reviews on these particular lables and they are just nothing special.
